scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma. It’s no use. There’s nothing
here.

Let’s try somewhere else. Man, such a waste
of effort!
Right, got it. By the way, Minoru...
Hmm? What’s up?

What was that stuff you were muttering to
yourself about before?
Muttering to myself...?
“Never fear, something-something,” I think.

Right before Falcomon evolved into
Yatagaramon...
Wait, WHAT?! You heard all that?!
Not all of it, exactly. Should I not have?
No, not exactly, it’s just... Ahh, maaan!

If you want me to pretend I didn’t hear
anything, I’ll just leave it at that.

Don’t go patronizing me, dude. You’ll give
a guy a complex.
What the heck are you talking about?
It’s just, well... Okay fine, I’ll tell you!
I was thinking up my pre-battle catchphrase.
Catchphrase?

You know, like action stars or those spandex-
wearing superhero teams shout before a fight.

Oh, right, gotcha. But, uh, why now, of all
times?

Not now, always! I’ve been a fan of those
kinda heroes since I was a kid.

Even now I set an alarm to make sure I see my
shows on Saturday morning.

Not that I let slip about any of this at
school. Of course you had no idea.

So that’s it. Still, if you’re so embarrassed
about it...

You don’t have to tell me! I get it, I know
it’s childish!

I still buy some of the toys, even at this
age. I know how lame that is.

But even so, the heart wants what the heart
wants. I wish I could be like them, y’know?

I mean, the ones that can transform go from
pretty lame to pretty cool real quick, right?

They never abandon their duties. They always
look ahead with hope, no matter what.

When I was a kid, that’s who I thought
I wanted to be.

But it’s no good. I can’t be a hero after
all.

You can’t? Why not? There’s no reason for you
to give up, is there?

It’s cool, I’m just not the hero type. I know
that better than anybody else.

I figured it out, coming to a crazy place
like this and dealing with problems.

I’m scared of dying, man. Notice how I vented
on Falcomon back there?

I mean, a hero would never do something so
lame.
Hey man, of course you’d be afraid to die.
Yeah, it’s obvious. Totally normal.

But my dream wasn’t to be normal. It was to
be special. To be a strong hero.
Ah...

In the eleventh hour, you believed in Agumon,
didn’t you, Takuma.

I think you make a better hero than I ever
would, man.

That’s why I’d be happy if I could just help
you out.

If I can contribute at all to us getting back
to our world, that’d be best for me.
I mean that’s a great help, but...
Great, glad to hear it. End of discussion!

Don’t tell anyone about that catchphrase
stuff, a’ight? It’s too embarrassing.
Oh, uh, yeah...

(I don’t know if I’m hero material either, so
I’ll just leave it at that...)

(Is Minoru really okay with this? I don’t
think it’s worth giving up on...)
